item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, April 4, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Google considers charging for AI-powered search in big change to business model
2. Private equity stakes unloaded at a discount as investors seek exits
3. Italy seizes assets worth €600mn in connection with alleged EU fraud
4.  Billionaires’ love for Trump could backfire
5. Chinese state banks are lenders to Thames Water’s parent company
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, April 4, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
